medical_history.chief_complaint: Diffuse abdominal pain localized to the right lower quadrant (RLQ).
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Abdominal pain started 2 days ago and is now localized to the RLQ. Associated symptoms include anorexia, low-grade fevers, and chills at home. There is no nausea or vomiting, and bowel movements are normal. Symptoms have been occurring for 2 days.
